DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess effect short-term infusion ketamine analgesic dosage immune response , morbidity mortality among patient suffer septic shock . We hypothesize ketamine modulate cytokine response sepsis reduce morbidity mortality .
DOC.criteria: Patients meet ACCP/ SCCM definition severe sepsis enrol study . These patient know suspected source infection . Patients within 12 hour development one organ dysfunction Patients must exhibit 3 follow sign clinical inflammation : Core temperature < 36ºC > 38ºC . Heart rate 90 great explain another medical condition . A respiratory rate > 20 min1 , PaCO2 < 32min1 need mechanical ventilation . A white blood cell count < 4000 cell/ml > 12000 cells/ml WBC show great 10 % immature neutrophil . pregnant increase intracranial pressure close head injury history psychotic mental disease receive Continuous Veno Venous Hemofiltration
